title: 148863950.less Bad Things
excerpt: A lot of what we do in our roles as designers, scientists, storytellers, and educators is about making better things, or enabling others to make better decisions.

children.text: A lot of what we do in our roles as designers, scientists, storytellers, and educators is about making better things, or enabling others to make better decisions.
And, in so doing, we often forget that making
bad things—by improving what’s broken and making sense of chaos—is just as valuable.
